thread.title: Avante Logixx Inc. Announces Grant of Incentive Options

author: cnbc.com
title: Avante Logixx Inc. Announces Grant of Incentive Options
text:
TORONTO, April 04, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Avante Logixx Inc. (TSXV:XX) (“ Avante ” or the “ Company ”) announced today that, effective today, it granted options to acquire an aggregate of 75,000 common shares to Andrew Coles, a recent appointment to the Company’s board of directors, at an exercise price of $0.37 per share subject to the terms and conditions of the Company’s 10% rolling stock option plan approved September 29, 2015 and ratified by shareholders at its AGM held September 19, 2017. All options granted have a term of five years and vest immediately. Pursuant to the terms of the Company’s 10% rolling stock option plan, a total of 8,177,038 options are available to be issued. Including the grant of options referenced above, there are 1,405,372 options currently available to be granted under the terms of the stock option plan.
About Avante Logixx
Avante Logixx Inc. (TSXV:XX) is a Toronto based provider of high end security services. We acquire, manage and build industry leading businesses which provide specialized, mission-critical solutions that address the needs of our customers. Our businesses continuously develop innovative solutions that enable our customers to achieve their objectives. With an experienced team and a proven track record of solid growth, we are taking steps to establish a broad portfolio of security businesses to provide our customers and shareholders with exceptional returns. Please visit our website at www.avantelogixx.com and consider joining our investor email list.
